name: Ghost&Zombie
description:
In this game, you can collect the souls of your enemies after killing theme. 

You can only use a soul once. 

Each soul have different abilities.

all the assets, sound, code... were made during the game jam

by Victor Steimberg

I inspired myself from the games; Ghost&Goblin(on the NES) and Cube World

I used Blender for the mesh , rig and  animation

I used the unreal engine

My email: steimbergvictor@gmail.com

I'm 17 years old
